featured.text: “We’d put half a pound of butter on a steak.
Making matters worse, the artificial butter substitute that generally 34 with microwavable popcorn contains a common food-flavoring substance.
Then pour the popcorn into a bowl and season with a small 40 of real butter or olive oil and natural salt.

definition.zh_def: 一種由牛奶或奶油製成的乳製品，通常用於烹飪或塗抹在食物上。
definition.en_def: A dairy product made from churning cream or milk, often used in cooking or as a spread.
definition.example: She spread butter on her toast before adding jam.
